translated: Verses of the Elders🔽The Group of Sixes
When I had gone forth as a novice,
By my psychic power I subdued
the great and mighty serpent king.
For my preceptor I brought water

analyzed: āharāmi tatas disvā  mam satthāḥ etat abravi
translated: Seeing that, the Teacher said to me:
“Sāriputta, look at this young man coming,
the good one served by the good,
his task done, his training completed.
wishes: ‘Let no one know me.’”🔽… the elder Sumana …
